remarks: Integral substitution, adding a constant to the function's argument. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
itgsbtaddcnst.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
itgsbtaddcnst.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
itgsbtaddcnst.aleb $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
itgsbtaddcnst.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
itgsbtaddcnst.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
itgsbtaddcnst $p |- ( ph -> S_ [ ( A - X ) -> ( B - X ) ] ( F ` ( X + s ) ) _d s = S_ [ A -> B ] ( F ` t ) _d t ) $.
$d A s $.
$d A s t $.
$d B s $.
$d B s t $.
$d F s $.
$d F s t $.
$d X s $.
$d X s t $.
$d ph s $.
$d ph s t $.
